actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to make a clarifying correction in an amendment made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 relating to the tax treatment of gains and losses in future transactions in commodities.

summary.text: Makes a clarifying amendment to the Tax Reform Act relating to the retention of a six month holding period for capital gains on agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to make a clarifying correction in an amendment made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 relating to the tax treatment of gains and losses in future transactions in commodities.
